expected_behavior: Detects QA tracking documents in changeset
Reads diff to extract issue IDs (QA-###, #42, BUG-123, etc.)
Maps code changes to specific issues
Generates commit message with issue ID in subject
For single issue: Formats as 'fix: <issue title> (<issue-id>)'
For multiple issues: Groups changes by issue with subsections
Links specific files to what they fix for each issue
Includes QA doc update in commit body
Preserves conventional commit format while being QA-aware
